Sentencas: Microstructure of electrodes determines the performance of electrochemical devices such as fuel cells and batteries.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: The efficiency and economic feasibility of these technologies depend on the stability of the microstructures throughout their lifetime.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: Although modeling techniques were proposed for determining electrode performance from 2- or 3-dimensional microstructural data, it is still extremely challenging to predict long-term structural degradation by means of numerical simulations.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: One of the major challenges is to overcome the difficulties in obtaining experimental data of an identical sample through the degradation process.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: In this work, a machine learning-based framework for predicting microstructural evolutions with limited amount of un-paired training data is proposed.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: Physically-constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation (UNIT) network is incorporated to predict nickel oxide reduction process in solid oxide fuel cell anode.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: The proposed framework is firstly validated by simplified toy-problems.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: Secondly, the UNIT network is applied to real microstructures of solid oxide fuel cells, which results in excellent visual and statistical agreements between real and artificially reduced samples.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: The proposed network can predict evolutions in new microstructures, which have not been used during training.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks

Sentencas: Furthermore, a conditional UNIT network (C-UNIT) was demonstrated, which can predict the microstructure evolutions based on process conditions as well as continuous time series of microstructural changes.
Titulo: Prediction of electrode microstructure evolutions with physically constrained unsupervised image-to-image translation networks
